cast.overview: Rizwan Khan, a Muslim from the Borivali section of Mumbai, has Asperger's syndrome. He marries a Hindu single mother, Mandira, in San Francisco. After 9/11, Rizwan is detained by authorities at LAX who treat him as a terrorist because of his condition and his race.
cast.title: My Name Is Khan

details.biography:
Arjun Mathur (born 18 October 1981) is a British Indian actor who has appeared in such Bollywood films as Luck by Chance and My Name Is Khan.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Arjun Mathur, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Arjun Mathur
